group_1.textRight: I can't believe that they'd actually summon@[textRed:Walpurgisnacht]...
(And I was planning to wait it out in@Kamihama.)
(I never expected they'd summon it there.)
(That means we have no choice but to wait@here in Mitakihara until it's over.)
Hey, I hate to throw a wrench in the works@here, but...
What even is [textRed:Walpurgisnacht]?

group_1.textLeft: It's a Witch.

group_1.textRight: Oh...

group_1.textLeft: I don't know too much about it either, but@Mami told me about it.
She said it has enough power to level an@entire city.

group_1.textRight: A whole city? Don't you think that's kinda@crazy-sounding?

group_1.textLeft: She's not exaggeratin'. Those're the facts.

group_1.textRight: So Mami's caught up in something that@dangerous? [chara:200401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200401:cheek_0][chara:200401:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:200401:lipSynch_1]This can't be happening...

group_1.textLeft: I don't think she's in her right mind.
But she's serious about seein' it through.

group_1.textRight: We gotta stop her!
I won't let Mami be responsible for this!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! We need to go to Kamihama!

group_1.textRight: (N-no! I can't let them go!)
W-wait!
It's already late. We should at least go@back home first.

group_1.textLeft: But!

group_1.textRight: Look at your phones.

group_1.textLeft: Oh...
No way.

group_1.textRight: It's been a whole day since we got locked up@in that Labyrinth.
No one was able to contact us... Your@families are probably worried sick.

group_1.textLeft: You're right...

group_1.textRight: Can we go home for tonight?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...okay.

group_1.textRight: (Phew.)

group_1.textLeft: Welp, my business is done here.

group_1.textRight: Wait a sec! What are you gonna do now?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? That's for me to know, not you.
We traded info, like we agreed on.
Now I'm free to do whatever I want.

group_1.textRight: WAIT!
If you're planning to go to Kamihama...@We should all go together.
She's right! It's really dangerous to go by@yourself.

group_1.textLeft: How many times do I gotta tell you guys...
I'm not playin' buddy buddy with you.
Later.

group_1.textRight: Kyoko!!!

group_1.textLeft: No... Kyoko...

group_1.textCenter: (I can't allow Sayaka or Madoka to go to@Kamihama.)
(I have to persuade them not to somehow.)
